titles: Roger the West-Country lad, set forth in his proper shape, or, The West-Country lasses sweet-heart described in answer to the well-shaped country lass to the tune of Cavalilly man.
notes: This item appears on the left half of sheet containing also, on right half, Wing (2nd ed.) V639.
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Magdalene College Library, University of Cambridge.
